Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Harrison/Throop
ShortDescription: Westbound 7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Racine, Taylor, Loomis and Harrison : due to, street blockage near Harrison/Throop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted via Harrison, Racine, Taylor, Loomis and Harrison : due to, street blockage near Harrison/Throop.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
